message_list.content: Hi and welcome to Celestar Air. I’m Nova, your virtual flight assistant. Thanks for calling! How can I help you today?
I just want to confirm the baggage allowance for Premium Economy on my flights.

Premium Economy includes:
- Carry-on: 1 bag up to 10 kg (22 lb), plus a personal item that fits under the seat.
- Checked bags: 2 pieces, each up to 23 kg (50 lb), max linear dimensions 158 cm (62 in).
- Oversize/overweight: Fees apply if a bag is larger or heavier than the limits.

If you share your route and ticket type (Flex or Saver), I can confirm any route-specific variations or promotions.
You’re welcome! Is there anything else I can help you with today?
Before you go, could you quickly rate your experience today from 1 to 5? Also, we’re offering the Celestar Air Stratos credit card with bonus miles—would you like me to send details?
Understood. Thanks for flying with Celestar Air—have a great day!
I appreciate your time today. Goodbye! Have a wonderful trip.

I appreciate your time today. Goodbye! Have a wonderful trip.
